amendment.description: Amendment to express the sense of Congress that the food available to schoolchildren under the school breakfast and lunch program should be selected so as to reduce the incidence of juvenile obesity and to maximize nutritional value.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 110-261 to express the sense of Congress that the food available to schoolchildren under the school breakfast and lunch program should be selected so as to reduce the incidence of juvenile obesity and to maximize nutritional value.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 422 - 3 (Roll no. 748).
